thread.title: Witchcraft to become Republic Diner + Sojubang
thread.title_full: Witchcraft to become Republic Diner + Sojubang - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Witchcraft to become Republic Diner + Sojubang
text:
Photo: Michael Paulsen, Chronicle Image 1 of / 9 9 Pink's Pizza. The "Santa Monica" pizza (with cranberries, gorgonzola & prosciutto). Friday, April 17, 2009, in Houston. The perfect afternoon snack: a pretzel with honey butter and a glass of wine at Shepherd Park Draught House. Photo: Syd Kearney Image 8 of 9 The Donut Waffle as served for brunch at the Shepherd Park Draught House. It's a waffle topped with two Shipley's glazed doughnuts, bacon, whip cream and chocolate sprinkles. The Donut Waffle as served for brunch at the Shepherd Park Draught House. It's a waffle topped with two Shipley's glazed doughnuts, bacon, whip cream and chocolate sprinkles. Photo: Syd Kearney Image 9 of 9 Witchcraft to become Republic Diner + Sojubang 1 / 9 Back to Gallery Delicious Concepts Restaurant Group has never been afraid of change.
Witchcraft Tavern & Provision Co. on 11th Street was not its first concept in that space. When first opened in 2012, it was an Asian concept called the Dragon Bowl. And earlier this year, the company shuttered its Tex-Mex eatery, The El Cantina Superior, to remake the space into a brewpub.
Over the summer, it was reported that former Dosi chef Jordan Asher would be taking the reins at Witchcraft and moving it away from a burger-centric menu.
Witchcraft was closed recently for another makeover. When it reopens Oct. 22, it will be Republic Diner + Sojubang and focused on Korean cuisine, including Korean barbecue (galbi), sizzling rice hot pots (dolsot bap) and twice fried chicken.
"I'm excited to finally launch this amazing concept and look forward to continuing to serve the community," Delicious Concepts CEO Ken Bridge said in a release.
The restaurant will be open for lunch, dinner and late-night dining on select evenings.
Republic Diner + Sojubang : 1221 W. 11th, 832-649-3601
Browse the slideshow above to see other Delicious Concepts properties.
